S.FORM: Hemay han ku manamuh waliay a tademaw (Cong kow, Hong Kong, Macau, Taywan, Zipun, etip nu Korea atu Vietnam) mukan tu kakanen. naizau tu ku tinku sa, caluway tu kita misahemay. u zuma a kamu: nu Hulam: nu Amilika: Cooked rice nu Zipun: (Meshi) u canan ku hemay: , , , , . , , , , , , .
